articles.title: Tony Abbott welcomes call for Taiwan, UK to join TPP, even if it upsets China | news.com.au — Australia's leading news site - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Former prime minister Tony Abbott says Taiwan should join the Trans Pacific Partnership even if it risks upsetting China, because the superpower should not be allowed anywhere near the group until it gives up its “bullying” tactics.
